discussion.content: Tested - A and B are correct

Correct.
The option Show in Trend Chart is available to add forecast columns to the trend chart while configuring the column in the forecast configuration. Only Roll up and Calculated column types can be displayed in the trend chart. 
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/sales/configure-premium-forecasting

questions.question_text:
A customer uses premium forecasting.

You need to add columns from the forecast to the Trend chart.

Which two types of columns should you add? Each correct answer presents a complete solution.

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

A company uses Dynamics 365 Sales.

You need to implement the Microsoft Relationship Sales solution.

Which add-on should you install?

comments.content: I think you can find your answer here. https://stackoverflow.com/questions/61753985/how-can-i-add-my-entity-to-side-menu-in-sales-hub

choices.A: Add Location to the App Designer.

questions.question_text:
A company creates a new table named Locations.

The sales team wants the Locations table visible in the Sales Hub.

You need to make the Locations table visible.

What should you do?

choices.D: Enable the Turn on Enhanced Microsoft Teams integration option.
choices.B: Add users to the correct security role.
choices.E: Disable the Turn on the linking of Dynamics 365 records to Microsoft Teams channels option.
choices.A: Add users to the Teams channel.
choices.C: Enable the External links within Teams option.

discussion.content:
D is the correct answer!!
Turn on Enhanced Microsoft Teams Integration
Allows pinning of records and views to a Teams channel directly from Dynamics 365 and suggests members to be added. Requires tenant admin permissions.

questions.question_text:
You are working in Dynamics 365 Sales. You turn on the visibility of the Dynamics 365 Sales records in the channel.

A user working with leads is unable to pin the view into Microsoft Teams.

You need to identify the issue.

What should you do?

discussion.content:
1. Power BI
2.Dynamics 365 Sales Chart
3. Power BI

1, 2, 1.
PBI needed for reporting on external data source and report scheduling.

questions.question_text:
DRAG DROP
-

A company uses Dynamics 365 Sales with no third-party products to design visual outputs for salespeople and managers.

You must create the following visualizations:

• A bar chart with leads and opportunities from Dynamics 365 Sales, as well as invoices from an ERP system.
• A Tag chart by month for the fiscal year.
• Weekly scheduled reports for management.

You need to select the tools to use.

Which tool should you use? To answer, drag the appropriate tools to the correct visualizations. Each tool may be used once, more than once, or not at all. You may need to drag the split bar between panes or scroll to view content.

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

//IMG//
